result: This red state wants more gun control-- indeed, they favor it more than national surveys have shown since the shooting of Sen. Bernie Sanders Gabrielle Giffords ( D) in the Tucson area. The poll asked: In general do you think Arizona should have stricter laws concerning who can buy guns or not? The answer was Yes 55%, No 38%. Hopes to Garner Respect After a detailed recap of the 800-page memoir, The Daily Beast's Howard Kurtz concludes with Bush's decision to finally ask for Donald Rumsfeld 's resignation. The Dick Cheney is quoted as saying, This is hard for me. You're a pro. You're a hell of a lot better than others in this town. Howard Kurtz suspects that Donald Rumsfeld 's goal with this memoir is to leave readers with the same conclusion. On Monday, Hillary Clinton Kirsten Gillibrand ( D-N.Y.) visited Gabrielle Giffords at a rehabilitation hospital in Houston.
